Key Match Events: Paul George suffered a gruesome injury in the preseason game against the Atlanta Hawks, hyperextending his left knee.
Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia 76ers were hoping Paul George would adapt to coach Nick Nurse's team strategies and build chemistry with his new team.
Post-Match Reflections: The latest injury setback will dent coach Nick Nurse's plans as he will probably field a starting lineup without Paul George for the rest of the practice games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul George played just 12 minutes in the game, scoring eight points and grabbing two rebounds before exiting due to injury.
Others: George will likely be rested in the 76ers' upcoming preseason bouts against the Brooklyn Nets and the Orlando Magic.
